title: Simple apple pie
ingredients: ['150g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons flour', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon lemon zest', '900g thinly sliced apples', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 recipe pastry for a double 23cm pie', '4 tablespoons milk (optional)']
